nodes.text: "Protect the Senator" was a bonus adventure story featured in the seventh installment of the Star Wars Adventures magazine collection. In that three-page roleplaying style scenario, the player assumed the identity of a Jedi tasked with protecting Senator Ister Paddie from an IG-88 assassin droid.

The fact that a Jedi still works with the Galactic Senate places the events of "Protect the Senator" before the Great Jedi Purge, which occurred at the end of the Clone Wars. However, The New Essential Guide to Droids established that IG-88 assassin droids were only created after the Clone Wars.
